page.title: 08Our Own School (Camp JMI)
page.content:
The school was built in{1897.}The front part is old and the rear is new. At the front of the school there is a plaque which says: { "This foundation stone was laid by { the Chairman of the Board Mr. J. T. { Patience on July 27th 1897" There is another plaque which says: { "St. Peters Rural School Board" Camp School has a bell tower. A new bell was hung in December 1984. We ring it on special occasions. The roof is old but there is a new TV aerial. There is a new boiler house at the side of the school and an old bike shed. In front of the school there are metal railings and a strip of tarmac behind; cars park on it.
{(Continued on Page 9)
